item.description:
Let's DANCE~ DANCE~ DANCE our way up the Dimensional Spiral into ecstatic Shamanic states of consciousness to bring in the New Year~!

Pass thru the 2012/2013 Portal and spend your New Year's Eve with the inspiring Evolvefest LoveTribe in Sacred Ceremony, Yoga, Loving Connection and Rituals of Realization~!

Tix available here:
http://evolvefestnewyear2013.eventbrite.com/

Our special guests will be "The Guides" aka. "The Word" as they are channeled thru Intuitive Paul Selig, whose channeled text "I Am The Word" is currently #1 on Amazon/Channeling and his brand new "The Book of Love and Creation" is at number #3!!

You may have seen Paul channeling "The Word" live at Evolvefest 2012 or on the new BIO Channel Series "The uneXplained".

Here is something The Guides want us all to know:

"You are all perfect creations, you are all deeply loved, and the realization of this, truthfully, will and would transform this planet in a second if it were realized in its fullness." (Channeling, 2009)

The Guides will count down with us into the New Year and then will take YOUR questions for an Inter-Dimensional Q&A Session~ NOT TO BE MISSED~!!! Prepare your mind, body and spirit for an unprecedented evening of real-life magic and intense divine flow~!

Invite your AWAKENING/AWAKENED friends and let's all move together into the Higher Dimensions of Bliss, Love and Ecstasy~! WE RISE AS ONE~! ♥ ♥ ♥

This is a drug and alcohol-free event~! ♥

This event is a fundraiser for Evolvefest and we are limiting tix to 50 lucky people~ get yours while they last~!

1st Tier Tix are $99 (9 left)
2nd Tier Tix are $149 (20 available)
3rd Tier Tix Are $199 (20 available)

All tiers include all amenities. Tier 1 is simply the lowest priced batch of tix, and once they sell out, the price goes up to the next tier~!

Tix available here:
http://evolvefestnewyear2013.eventbrite.com/

Tix include Superfood Organic Vegan "Mamalicious" Feast, a complimentary glass of non-alcoholic Champagne for a Midnight New Year's Toast, a bed for the night, A.M. Yoga and a lite Brunch~!

Circle of Trees Retreat Center Lodge is located in Milford, PA.
http://www.circleoftreesretreat.com/circle_of_trees_retreat.php
item.name: EVOLVEFEST New Years Eve Event - Shift your vibration in 2013!
